00044 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00045 void Loudness::calculate(Sound& snd, m_rate_type rate)
00046 {
00047     // count the number of Partials:
00048     int numPartials = snd.size();
00049 
00050     // Create a linear interpolator for each partial.
00051     // this will become that partial's loudness scaling factor
00052     vector<LinearInterpolator> scalingFactors(numPartials);
00053     
00054     // Set each partial's Frequency
00055     // Dynamic Variable to the proper duration and sampling rate:
00056     m_time_type duration = snd.getParam(DURATION);
00057     // Also, Collect a frequency iterator from each partial
00058     vector< Iterator<m_value_type> > freqIter;
00059     // finally, grab the maximum waveshape value from each partial
00060     vector<m_value_type> maxWaveShape;
00061     // go:
00062     for (int i=0; i<numPartials; i++)
00063     {
00064         Partial& part = snd.get(i);
00065         part.getParam(FREQUENCY).setDuration(duration);
00066         part.getParam(FREQUENCY).setSamplingRate(rate);
00067         freqIter.push_back( part.getParam(FREQUENCY).valueIterator() );
00068         maxWaveShape.push_back( part.getParam(WAVE_SHAPE).getMaxValue() );
00069     }
00070 
00071     // create a vector of critical band objects (one for each valid band)
00072     vector<CriticalBand> CBands;
00073     for (int i=0; i<NUM_BANDS; i++)
00074             CBands.push_back( CriticalBand(i) );
00075     
00076     // calculate the number of samples to do loudness on:
00077     m_sample_count_type numSamples = (m_sample_count_type) ((m_time_type)rate * (m_time_type)duration);
00078     
00079     // iterate over time:
00080     for (int s=0; s<numSamples; s++)
00081     {
00082         // calculate a relative time [0,1]
00083         m_time_type relativeTime = float(s) / float(numSamples);
00084         
00085         // the loudestPartial:
00086         m_value_type maxAmp = 0.0;
00087         
00088         // for each partial
00089         for (int p=0; p<numPartials; p++)
00090         {
00091             // get the values:
00092             m_value_type freq = freqIter[p].next();
00093             m_value_type waveShape = maxWaveShape[p];
00094                         
00095             // scale the amplitude by the relative amplitude:
00096             m_value_type thisAmp = waveShape * snd.get(p).getParam(RELATIVE_AMPLITUDE);
00097             
00098             // is this the loudest partial?
00099             if (thisAmp > maxAmp) maxAmp = thisAmp;
00100         
00101             // create a snapshot for this moment in time:
00102             PartialSnapshot snap(p, freq, waveShape);
00103             
00104             // add this snapshot to the appropriate critical band:
00105             CBands[criticalBandIndex(freq)].partials_.push_back(snap);
00106         }
00107         
00108         // calculate the band gamma for each band:
00109         vector<m_value_type> bandGamma(NUM_BANDS);
00110         for (int i=0; i<NUM_BANDS; i++)
00111             bandGamma[i] = CBands[i].getBandGamma(maxAmp);
00112         
00113         // find the maximum band gamma:
00114         m_value_type maxGamma = 0;
00115         for (int i=0; i<NUM_BANDS; i++)
00116             if (bandGamma[i] > bandGamma[(int)maxGamma]) bandGamma[(int)maxGamma] = bandGamma[i];
00117 
00118         // calculate the numerator:
00119         m_value_type gammaTotal = 0.0;
00120         for (int i=0; i<NUM_BANDS; i++)
00121             if (i != maxGamma) gammaTotal += bandGamma[i] * BANDS[i][F_FACTOR];
00122         m_value_type numerator = snd.getParam(LOUDNESS) / (bandGamma[(int)maxGamma] + gammaTotal);
00123         
00124         // for each band:
00125         for (int b=0; b<NUM_BANDS; b++)
00126         {
00127             int size = CBands[b].partials_.size();
00128             // for each partial
00129             for (int p=0; p<size; p++)
00130             {
00131                 //calculate the scaling factor
00132                 m_value_type scaleFactor = CBands[b].partials_[p].getScalingFactor(
00133                     b, maxAmp, numerator);
00134                 //grab the id of this partial:
00135                 int partial_id = CBands[b].partials_[p].ID_;
00136                 
00137                 // scale the factor by the relative amplitude again:
00138                 scaleFactor *= snd.get(partial_id).getParam(RELATIVE_AMPLITUDE);
00139 
00140                 //add the scaling factor for this moment in time.
00141                 scalingFactors[partial_id].addEntry(relativeTime, scaleFactor);
00142             }
00143         }
00144         
00145         
00146         // clear the critical bands:
00147         for (int i=0; i<NUM_BANDS; i++)
00148             CBands[i].partials_.clear();
00149         
00150         
00151     } // end iterating over time
00152 
00153     // set every partial's scaling factors:
00154     for (int p=0; p<numPartials; p++)
00155         snd.get(p).setParam(LOUDNESS_SCALAR, scalingFactors[p]);
00156 }

00160 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00161 int Loudness::criticalBandIndex(m_value_type freq)
00162 {
00163     // border conditions:
00164     if (freq < BANDS[0][LOWER_BOUND])
00165     {
00166         return 0;
00167         cout << "WARNING: Frequency (" << freq 
00168              << ") outside of any critical bands." << endl;
00169     }
00170     if (freq > BANDS[NUM_BANDS-1][UPPER_BOUND])
00171     {
00172         return NUM_BANDS-1;
00173         cout << "WARNING: Frequency (" << freq 
00174              << ") outside of any critical bands." << endl;
00175     }
00176     
00177     // common case:
00178     for (int i=0; i<NUM_BANDS; i++)
00179     {
00180         if (freq < BANDS[i][UPPER_BOUND])
00181             return i;
00182     }
00183     
00184     cout << "ERROR: didn't find a critical band for this frequency." << endl;
00185     return NUM_BANDS-1;
00186 }

00191 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

00193 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00194 Loudness::CriticalBand::CriticalBand(int ID)
00195     :ID_(ID) {}
00196         
00197         
00198 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00199 m_value_type Loudness::CriticalBand::getBandGamma(m_value_type maxAmp)
00200 {
00201     m_value_type bandGamma = 0.0;
00202     
00203     for (int p=0; p<partials_.size(); p++)
00204     {
00205         bandGamma += pow(
00206             (double)(partials_[p].amp_ / maxAmp),
00207             (double)(1.0 / log10(2.0) / BANDS[ID_][SLOPE]) );
00208     }
00209 
00210     bandGamma = pow(
00211         (double)bandGamma,
00212         (double)(log10(2.0) / BANDS[ID_][SLOPE]) );
00213 
00214     return bandGamma;
00215 }
00216

00218 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00219 //              PARTIAL SNAPSHOT CLASS
00220 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00221 
00222 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00223 Loudness::PartialSnapshot::PartialSnapshot(int ID, m_value_type freq, m_value_type amp)
00224     :ID_(ID), freq_(freq), amp_(amp) {}
00225         
00226 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00227 m_value_type Loudness::PartialSnapshot::getScalingFactor(
00228     int bandID, m_value_type maxAmp, m_value_type numerator)
00229 {
00230     // [eq 2.37]
00231     m_value_type Ls = (amp_ / maxAmp) * numerator;
00232     
00233     // [eq 2.4]
00234     m_value_type Lp = log(Ls) / log(2.0) * 10.0 + 40.0;
00235     
00236     // [eq 2.13]
00237     m_value_type L = BANDS[bandID][OFFSET] + ( BANDS[bandID][SLOPE] * Lp );
00238 
00239     // [eq 2.5]
00240     m_value_type A = pow(10.0, (-1.0 * ( (120.0 - L) / 20.0 ) ) );
00241 
00242 
00243     return (A / amp_);
00244 }

00250 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00251 // DECLARE THE CRITICAL BAND DATA:
00252 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00253 //Definition for the fixed critical bands
00254 //Column 1:   Lower bounds of band
00255 //Column 2:   Upper bounds of band
00256 //Column 3:   Centeriod (in Hz) of frequency band
00257 //Column 4:   Bandwidth (in Hz) of frequency band
00258 //Column 5:   F factor of frequency band
00259 //Column 6:   Offset $-a/b$ of frequency band, $L = (-a/b) + (1/b) L_p$
00260 //Column 7:   Slope $1/b$ of frequency band, $L = (-a/b) + (1/b) L_p$
00261 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
